name: Smoked Salmon and Lentil Salad
author: Lynn Pennec
summary: A luxurious twist on a wholesome and tasty lentil salad. Serve with fresh tomatoes, mesclun, and fresh bread.
ingredients: 10 ounces smoked salmon, or more to taste
salt and ground black pepper to taste
directions: Combine water, lentils, and bouquet garni in a large saucepan; bring to a boil
Cover, reduce heat to low, and simmer until lentils are tender but still firm and there is only a little excess cooking liquid in the pan, about 20 minutes
Remove from the heat and let lentils cool in the pan
Cut salmon into small strips, no longer than 1/2 inch long
Place in a large bowl with onion and chives
Whisk olive oil, vinegar, mustard, salt, and pepper together in a small bowl
Add to the lentil mixture and stir until well combined
Serve immediately or refrigerate until flavors have blended, 2 to 3 hours
